trans-unit.source: Provides access to the shared speech recognition service available on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 為 Windows 桌面上共用的語音辨識服務提供存取。

trans-unit.source: Applications use the shared recognizer to access Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式會使用共用辨識器來存取 Windows 語音辨識。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object to add to the Windows speech user experience.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>物件新增至 Windows 語音使用者體驗。

trans-unit.source: This class provides control over various aspects of the speech recognition process:
trans-unit.target: 這個類別提供控制語音辨識程序的各個層面：

trans-unit.source: To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理 語音辨識文法，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To get information about current speech recognition operations, subscribe to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>’s <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前的語音資訊辨識作業，請訂閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: To view or modify the number of alternate results the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢視或修改替代的辨識器傳回的結果數目，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器傳回辨識導致<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>物件。

trans-unit.source: To access or monitor the state of the shared recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取，或監視共用辨識器的狀態，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更同步至辨識器，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器會使用多個執行緒執行工作。

trans-unit.source: To emulate input to the shared recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要模擬共用辨識器的輸入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The configuration of Windows Speech Recognition is managed by the use of the **Speech Properties** dialog in the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Windows 語音辨識的組態使用由管理**語音內容**對話方塊**控制台**。

trans-unit.source: This interface is used to select the default desktop speech recognition engine and language, the audio input device, and the sleep behavior of speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面用來選取預設桌面的語音辨識引擎和語言、 音訊輸入的裝置和語音辨識的睡眠行為。

trans-unit.source: If the configuration of Windows Speech Recognition is changed while the application is running, (for instance, if speech recognition is disabled or the input language is changed), the change affects all <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 語音辨識] 的組態變更應用程式執行期間，（比方說，如果已停用 [語音辨識，或輸入的語言變更），變更會影響所有<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>物件。

trans-unit.source: To create an in-process speech recognizer that is independent of Windows Speech Recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立獨立於 Windows 語音辨識同處理序語音辨識器，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>類別。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A>釋放語音辨識器您最後一個參考之前。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放記憶體回收行程呼叫辨識器物件的直到`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that loads a speech recognition grammar and demonstrates asynchronous emulated input, the associated recognition results, and the associated events raised by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式載入 語音辨識文法和示範非同步模擬的輸入、 相關聯的辨識結果，以及語音辨識器所引發的相關的事件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is not running, then starting this application will also start Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果未執行 Windows 語音辨識，然後啟動此應用程式將也會啟動 Windows 語音辨識。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> always returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 語音辨識處於**想念你**狀態，然後<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>一定會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object maintains a separate set of speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>物件會維護一組個別的語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that loads a speech recognition grammar and demonstrates asynchronous emulated input, the associated recognition results, and the associated events raised by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式載入 語音辨識文法和示範非同步模擬的輸入、 相關聯的辨識結果，以及語音辨識器所引發的相關的事件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is not running, then starting this application will also start Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果未執行 Windows 語音辨識，然後啟動此應用程式將也會啟動 Windows 語音辨識。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> always returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 語音辨識處於**想念你**狀態，然後<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>一定會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音辨識器所接收的音訊格式。

trans-unit.source: The audio input format for the speech recognizer, or <see langword="null" /> if the input to the recognizer is not configured.
trans-unit.target: 語音格式，如果未設定辨識器的輸入則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音辨識器所接收的音訊層級。

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器的輸入音量，大小從 0 到 100。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the shared recognizer reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 當共用辨識器報告其音訊輸入層級時發生。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器會引發此事件每秒多次。

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 用來引發事件的頻率取決於應用程式執行所在的電腦。

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的音訊的層級的事件時，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前音訊的辨識器的輸入層級，使用的辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioLevelUpdated` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派`AudioLevelUpdated`事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a handler for the `AudioLevelUpdated` event to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會加入處理常式`AudioLevelUpdated`事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>物件。

trans-unit.source: The handler outputs the new audio level to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式會輸出到主控台的新音訊層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供語音辨識器輸入的裝置正在產生的音訊資料流中目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: The current location in the speech recognizer's audio input stream through which it has received input.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器自其中接收到輸入之音訊輸入資料流中的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer receives input while the desktop speech recognition is running.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器接收輸入桌面的語音辨識 正在執行時。

trans-unit.source: The `AudioPosition` property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: `AudioPosition`屬性會參考其產生的音訊資料流中的輸入的裝置的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position in processing audio input.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>屬性會參考在處理音訊輸入辨識器的位置。

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 這些位置可能會不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果辨識器已接收輸入它具有不尚未產生辨識結果，則值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>屬性小於的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the shared speech recognizer uses a dictation grammar to match speech input.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，共用的語音辨識器會使用聽寫文法，來比對語音輸入。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected> event writes to the console the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A> when the speech recognizer detects speech at its input.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>事件寫入至主控台<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>當語音辨識器偵測到在其輸入的語音。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer encounters a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: 在辨識器遇到音訊訊號的問題時發生。

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得哪些問題發生，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派`AudioSignalProblemOccurred`事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines an event handler that gathers information about an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義事件處理常式，收集的資訊關於`AudioSignalProblemOccurred`事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音辨識器所接收的音訊狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器之音訊輸入的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state changes in the audio being received by the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 在辨識器所接收的音訊變更狀態時發生。

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的音訊的狀態事件時，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得辨識器的輸入音訊的目前狀態，請使用 辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需音訊狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioStateChanged` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派`AudioStateChanged`事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a handler for the `AudioStateChanged` event to write the recognizer's new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A> to the console each time it changes using a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用的處理常式`AudioStateChanged`事件来寫入辨識器的新<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>主控台每次使用的成員變更<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 處置 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 處置 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: 處置 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件，並釋放工作階段期間所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Emulates input to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 在同步語音辨識中使用文字而不使用音訊，模擬對共用語音辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: These methods bypass the system audio input.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會略過輸入的系統音效。

trans-unit.source: This can be helpful when you are testing or debugging an application or grammar.
trans-unit.target: 您正在測試或偵錯應用程式或文法時，這十分有用。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then these methods return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 語音辨識處於**想念你**狀態，則這些方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器會忽略新行和額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object generated by the shared recognizer in response to emulated input has a value of `null` for its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>回應模擬輸入共用的辨識器所產生的物件具有值為`null`針對其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To emulate asynchronous recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要模擬非同步辨識，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 辨識作業的輸出。

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 在共用的語音辨識器上模擬片語輸入，針對同步的語音辨識使用文字而不使用音訊。

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or <see langword="null" />, if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.
trans-unit.target: 辨識作業的辨識結果，如果作業不成功或 Windows 語音辨識處於 [睡眠] 狀態則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: 隨附於 Vista 和 Windows 7 的辨識器忽略大小寫，並將文法規則套用至輸入的片語時，字元寬度。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這種類型的比較的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>列舉值<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.OrdinalIgnoreCase>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions.IgnoreWidth>。

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器也會忽略新行和額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。

trans-unit.target: 您正在測試或偵錯應用程式或文法時，這十分有用。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer completes the asynchronous recognition operation, it raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器完成非同步的辨識作業時，會引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then the shared recognizer does not process input and does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected> and related events, but still raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the shared recognizer finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation for emulated input.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器針對模擬輸入完成非同步辨識作業時發生。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法開始非同步的辨識作業。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器引發`EmulateRecognizeCompleted`時它結束非同步作業的事件。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous recognition operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: 非同步辨識作業可能會引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>事件是最後一個這類辨識器引發對指定作業的事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派`EmulateRecognizeCompleted`事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object is ready to process speech.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件是否準備好可以處理語音。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object is performing speech recognition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件正在執行語音辨識則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to this property do not affect other instances of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
trans-unit.target: 變更這個屬性不會影響的其他執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>類別。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property is `true` for a newly instantiated instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>屬性是`true`新具現化的執行個體的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>。

trans-unit.source: While the recognizer is disabled, none of the recognizer's speech recognition grammars are available for recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器已停用，而辨識器的語音辨識文法中沒有任何可辨識作業。

trans-unit.source: Setting the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property has no effect on the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定的辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>屬性已辨識器不會影響<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> objects that are loaded in this <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得在這個 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> 執行個體中載入之 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> objects that the application loaded into the current instance of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" />物件的集合，應用程式會將這些物件載入共用的辨識器的目前執行個體中。

trans-unit.source: This property does not return any speech recognition grammars loaded by another application.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會傳回任何語音辨識另一個應用程式載入的文法。

trans-unit.source: The following example outputs information to the console for each speech recognition grammar loaded into the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會輸出到主控台的每個載入共用的語音辨識器中的語音辨識文法的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: Loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 載入語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果語音辨識文法已載入，以非同步方式載入，或無法載入任何辨識器共用辨識器，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以非同步方式載入語音辨識文法，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that loads a speech recognition grammar and demonstrates asynchronous emulated input, the associated recognition results, and the associated events raised by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式載入 語音辨識文法和示範非同步模擬的輸入、 相關聯的辨識結果，以及語音辨識器所引發的相關的事件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is not running, then starting this application will also start Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果未執行 Windows 語音辨識，然後啟動此應用程式將也會啟動 Windows 語音辨識。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> always returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 語音辨識處於**想念你**狀態，然後<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>一定會傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式載入語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer completes this asynchronous operation, it raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器完成這項非同步作業時，會引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果語音辨識文法已載入，以非同步方式載入，或無法載入任何辨識器辨識器，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式載入語音辨識文法，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer finishes the asynchronous loading of a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 在辨識器完成語音辨識文法的非同步載入時發生。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法啟始非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `LoadGrammarCompleted` event when it completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器引發`LoadGrammarCompleted`完成作業時的事件。

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that the recognizer loaded, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>辨識器載入的物件，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To get the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects the recognizer has loaded, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>辨識器載入之後，物件會使用的辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a `LoadGrammarCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派`LoadGrammarCompleted`事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a shared speech recognizer, and then creates two types of grammars for recognizing specific words and for accepting free dictation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立共用的語音辨識器，，，然後建立兩種類型的可辨識的特定文字和接受可用聽寫的文法。

trans-unit.source: The example asynchronously loads all the created grammars to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會以非同步方式載入至辨識器所有建立的文法。

trans-unit.source: Handlers for the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events write to the console the name of the grammar that was used to perform the recognition and the text of the recognition result, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器的處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件寫入至主控台用來執行辨識和文字的辨識結果，分別文法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the shared recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定共用辨識器為每個辨識作業傳回之替代辨識結果的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of alternate results that the speech recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器為每個辨識作業傳回之替代結果的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>類別包含的集合<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>物件，表示輸入的其他候選解讀方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A> is 10.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A>為 10。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示當應用程式正在處理 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> 事件時，共用辨識器是否會暫停辨識作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the shared recognizer waits to process input while any application is handling the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果共用辨識器會在有任何應用程式正在處理 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> 事件時等候處理輸入則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true`, if within the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler your application needs to change the state of the speech recognition service or change the loaded or enabled speech recognition grammars before the speech recognition service processes more input.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為`true`，如果內<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>應用程式需要變更 語音辨識服務的狀態，或變更 語音辨識服務之前載入或啟用語音辨識文法的事件處理常式更多輸入處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> property to `true` causes each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler in every application to block the Windows speech recognition service.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>屬性`true`會導致每個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>封鎖 Windows 語音辨識服務每個應用程式中的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To synchronize the changes to the shared recognizer with your application state, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更同步至共用辨識器與應用程式的狀態，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A> is `true`, during the execution of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> handler the speech recognition service pauses and buffers new audio input as it arrives.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>是`true`，在執行期間<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>處理常式的語音辨識服務會暫停，到達時加以會緩衝處理新的音訊輸入。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler exits, the speech recognition service resumes recognition and starts processing information from its input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件處理常式結束時，語音辨識服務繼續辨識並開始處理輸入緩衝區的資訊。

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable the speech recognition service, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用或停用 語音辨識服務，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得辨識器正在處理的音訊輸入的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器在其所處理之音訊輸入中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The `RecognizerAudioPosition` property references the recognizer's position in processing its audio input.
trans-unit.target: `RecognizerAudioPosition`屬性會參考在處理其音訊輸入辨識器的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>屬性會參考其產生的音訊資料流中的輸入的裝置的位置。

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 這些位置可能會不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果辨識器已接收輸入它具有不尚未產生辨識結果，則值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>屬性小於的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 取得共用語音辨識器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 共用語音辨識器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This property returns information about the speech recognizer in use by Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回使用中的 Windows 語音辨識語音辨識器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following example sends information about the shared recognizer to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將共用辨識器的相關資訊傳送至主控台。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer pauses to synchronize recognition and other operations.
trans-unit.target: 在辨識器暫停以同步處理辨識和其他作業時發生。

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> before modifying its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停的執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>之前修改其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，雖然<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>會暫停，您可以載入、 卸載、 啟用和停用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>引發這個事件時就準備好接受修改。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a console application that loads and unloads <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的主控台應用程式載入和卸載<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。

trans-unit.source: The application uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method to request the speech recognition engine to pause so it can receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>要求暫停，讓它可以接收更新的語音辨識引擎的方法。

trans-unit.source: The application then loads or unloads a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式，然後載入或卸載<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。

trans-unit.source: At each update, a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event writes the name and status of the currently loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在每一個更新處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件寫入目前載入的狀態與名稱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件至主控台。

trans-unit.source: As grammars are loaded and unloaded, the application first recognizes the names of farm animals, then the names of farm animals and the names of fruits, then only the names of fruits.
trans-unit.target: 載入及卸載文法時，應用程式第一次可辨識的伺服器陣列動物名稱 動物伺服陣列的名稱和的水果，名稱然後水果的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.
trans-unit.target: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to synchronize changes to the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來同步處理對共用辨識器。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you load or unload a speech recognition grammar while the recognizer is processing input, use this method and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event to synchronize your application behavior with the state of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您載入或卸載語音辨識文法辨識器正在處理的輸入時，使用這個方法和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>辨識器的狀態與同步處理您的應用程式行為的事件。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the recognizer pauses or completes asynchronous operations and generates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器呼叫這個方法時，暫停或完成非同步作業，並產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event handler can then modify the state of the recognizer in between recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件處理常式可以修改辨識作業之間的辨識器的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called:
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫此方法：

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is not processing input, the recognizer immediately generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器未處理的輸入，辨識器立即產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is processing input that consists of silence or background noise, the recognizer pauses the recognition operation and generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在處理無回應或背景噪音所組成的輸入時，辨識器暫停辨識作業，並產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is processing input that does not consist of silence or background noise, the recognizer completes the recognition operation and then generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在處理不含無回應或背景噪音的輸入時，辨識器完成辨識作業，並接著會產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: While the recognizer is handling the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event:
trans-unit.target: 辨識器正在處理時<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件：

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not process input, and the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器不會處理輸入，以及值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>屬性維持不變。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer continues to collect input, and the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property can change.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器會繼續收集輸入，以及值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>屬性可變更。

trans-unit.source: To change whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更共用辨識器應用程式正在處理時，暫停辨識作業是否<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件時，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a console application that loads and unloads <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的主控台應用程式載入和卸載<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。

trans-unit.source: The application uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method to request the speech recognition engine to pause so it can receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>要求暫停，讓它可以接收更新的語音辨識引擎的方法。

trans-unit.source: The application then loads or unloads a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式，然後載入或卸載<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。

trans-unit.source: At each update, a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event writes the name and status of the currently loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在每一個更新處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件寫入目前載入的狀態與名稱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件至主控台。

trans-unit.source: As grammars are loaded and unloaded, the application first recognizes the names of farm animals, then the names of farm animals and the names of fruits, then only the names of fruits.
trans-unit.target: 載入及卸載文法時，應用程式第一次可辨識的伺服器陣列動物名稱 動物伺服陣列的名稱和的水果，名稱然後水果的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.
trans-unit.target: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>是`null`。

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供使用者語彙基元，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的音訊位置的位移，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的資訊，包含該作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態，以及提供相關聯事件的使用者語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>包含值的`userToken`參數。

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的音訊位置的位移，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的資訊，包含該作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition" /> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition" /> 起將要求延遲的位移。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 要求共用辨識器暫停並更新其狀態，以及提供相關聯事件的位移和使用者語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> plus the value of the `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器不會啟動辨識器更新要求，直到辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>等於目前<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>再加上值`audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`參數。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>包含值的`userToken`參數。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器偵測到可辨識為語音的輸入時發生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event in response to input.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器可能會引發此事件以回應輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>物件可指出辨識器偵測到語音輸入資料流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application for choosing origin and destination cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式選擇來源和目的地城市班機的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The application recognizes phrases such as "I want to fly from Miami to Chicago."
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可辨識片語，例如 「 我想要從邁阿密飛對芝加哥 」。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected> event to report the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> each time speech is detected.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>事件報告<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>偵測到每個時間語音。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 在辨識器已辨識的文字可能是文法中多個完整片語的元件時發生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event when the input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器可以時引發這個事件的輸入是模稜兩可。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: 例如支援的其中一個辨識語音辨識文法 」 新遊戲請 」 或 「 新的遊戲，「 」 新遊戲請 」 是模稜兩可的輸入，而 「 新遊戲"模稜兩可的輸入。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example recognizes phrases such as "Display the list of artists in the jazz category".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會辨識片語，例如 「 顯示演出者爵士類別目錄中的清單 」。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> event to display incomplete phrase fragments in the console as they are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>事件，因為它們會辨識為在主控台顯示不完整的片語片段。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that does not match any of the speech recognition grammars it has loaded.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器接收到不符合任何已載入的語音辨識文法的輸入時發生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 如果它決定輸入不符合足夠放心地載入的語音辨識任何的文法共用辨識器會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>包含拒絕<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>物件。

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器所管理的信賴閾值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>、 相關聯的使用者設定檔和儲存在 Windows 登錄中。

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該不會寫入登錄的共用辨識器的屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example recognizes phrases such as "Display the list of artists in the jazz category" or "Display albums gospel".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會辨識片語這類 「 爵士類別目錄中顯示演出者清單 」 或 「 顯示專輯 gospel 」。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event to display a notification in the console when the speech input cannot be matched to the contents of the grammar with sufficient confidence to produce a successful recognition.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用的處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>無法對應到文法的內容有足夠的信心地產生成功辨識的語音輸入時，主控台中顯示通知的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that matches one of its speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器接收到符合其中一個語音辨識文法的輸入時發生。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `SpeechRecognized` event if it determines with sufficient confidence that input matches one of the loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器引發`SpeechRecognized`事件，如果它有足夠的信心地輸入符合其中一個已載入及啟用語音辨識文法所決定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>包含接受<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>物件。

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器所管理的信賴閾值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>、 相關聯的使用者設定檔和儲存在 Windows 登錄中。

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該不會寫入登錄的共用辨識器的屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器收到符合文法中，輸入<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件可以引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>語音辨識器之前，會引發事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that loads a speech recognition grammar and demonstrates speech input to the shared recognizer, the associated recognition results, and the associated events raised by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式載入 語音辨識文法及示範共用辨識器、 相關聯的辨識結果，以及相關聯的事件引發的語音辨識器的語音輸入的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is not running, then starting this application will also start Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果未執行 Windows 語音辨識，然後啟動此應用程式將也會啟動 Windows 語音辨識。

trans-unit.source: Spoken input such as "I want to fly from Chicago to Miami" will trigger a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如 「 我想要從芝加哥飛到邁阿密 」 將會觸發的語音輸入<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: Speaking the phrase "Fly me from Houston to Chicago " will not trigger a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 說片語 「 飛分享從休斯頓對芝加哥 」 不會觸發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event to display successfully recognized phrases and the semantics they contain in the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用的處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件 以顯示成功辨識片語以及它們包含在主控台中的語意。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see langword="SpeechRecognizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SpeechRecognizer" /> 物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates whether the shared recognizer resident in Windows is in the `Stopped` or the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: 這個唯讀屬性會指出位於 Windows 共用的辨識器是否處於`Stopped`或`Listening`狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the running state of the Windows Desktop Speech Technology recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: 當 Windows 桌面語音技術辨識引擎的執行狀態變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event when the state of Windows Speech Recognition changes to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Listening> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Stopped> state.
trans-unit.target: 共用辨識器引發這個事件的 Windows 語音辨識狀態變更為<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Listening>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Stopped>狀態。

trans-unit.source: To get the state of the shared recognizer at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在事件時取得共用辨識器的狀態，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the shared recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得共用辨識器的目前狀態，請使用 辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的委派<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>事件，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a shared speech recognizer, and then creates two types of grammars for recognizing specific words and for accepting free dictation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立共用的語音辨識器，，，然後建立兩種類型的可辨識的特定文字和接受可用聽寫的文法。

trans-unit.source: The example asynchronously loads all the created grammars to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會以非同步方式載入至辨識器所有建立的文法。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method to put Windows Recognition in "listening" mode.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>事件使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法，將 Windows 辨識置於 「 接聽 」 模式。

trans-unit.source: Unloads all speech recognition grammars from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 從共用辨識器卸載所有語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a grammar asynchronously, this method waits until the grammar is loaded, before it unloads all of the recognizer's grammars.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在以非同步方式載入文法，這個方法會等候直到載入文法時之前它卸載所有的辨識器的文法。

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要卸除特定文法，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The grammar to unload.
trans-unit.target: 要卸載的文法。

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified speech recognition grammar from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 從共用辨識器卸載指定的語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。

trans-unit.source: To unload all grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要卸除所有的文法，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>方法。
